pages.title: Rock Monitor
pages.text: The rock monitor ($(o)Varanus albigularis$()) is a species of monitor lizard in the family Varanidae.$(br2)The species is endemic to Central, East, and southern Africa.$(br2)It is the second-longest lizard found on the continent, and the heaviest-bodied; locally, it is called leguaan or likkewaan.

pages.title: Rock Monitor
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
